subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ryan Callahan ended the Rangers’ four-year-old goal drought in Montreal, and the rookie Cam Talbot made 22 saves for his first N.H.L. shutout victory over the Canadiens.
snippet: Ryan Callahan ended the Rangers’ four-year-old goal drought in Montreal, and the rookie Cam Talbot made 22 saves for his first N.H.L. shutout victory over the Canadiens.
